Axis

Industrial Design, Graphic Design, Photography, Videography
The Problem

For my senior thesis project, I studied Japanese host etiquette and its use of empathic thinking, and sought ways to apply it to functional furniture. This project allowed me to exercise and refine my sense of design thinking. To make a relevant object in today’s world, it is important to remember that design should not be for oneself, but for the many.

The Solution

Axis is a modular and customizable organizational system around which the user can streamline their life. This piece of furniture serves the user and is adaptable to the user’s lifestyle. Axis was designed to accomodate any user and their habits. Born from studying a variety of people’s everyday carry, Axis is an entryway organization system for any person or family. The system has a small selection of available add­ons that attach to a central axis. Each item can house a variety of objects that a person might carry from day to day, season to season.
